data.strFullDescription:
Crab Game is a First-Person Multiplayer game where you fight for the ultimate cash price in different minigames based on children's games, until only one player is left to claim it all. [b]Definitely not based on any online streaming pop culture korean tv shows, as that would get me in legal trouble, so we're certainly not doing that.[/b]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1782210/extras/ss1_small.png?t=1638221608[/img]

[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*] Up to 35 players
[*] 28 Maps
[*] 9 Game-modes
[*] Server List
[*] Milk
[/list]

If you're not sold on this game yet, just listen to what our very satisifed customers have to say about it! 
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1782210/extras/Face.png?t=1638221608[/img] [i]"hey this game is pretty cool" [/i] - Jeff
[i](Photo of Jeff)[/i]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1782210/extras/Face.png?t=1638221608[/img] [i]"really fun with friends and family haha" [/i] - Also Jeff
[i](another picture of jeff)[/i]
data.strSnippet: Crab Game is a First-Person Multiplayer game where you play through several different minigames based on children's games, until only one player stands victorious.
